modName: Red and Black Dragonscale Retexture M and F
summary: A nice red and black texture for dragonscale armour to stop it looking so dull!
descriptionHtml:
I always thought the original Dragon Scale armour looked a little dull, and didn\'t really go with anything. so I decided to retexture the whole thing to make it look a little more.. interesting.
The scales themselves are now a deep red while the underarmour has been darkened to a near black colour. However, the horns and metal have been left the same, I figured it looked alright as it was.

I\'ve only done red and black for now, but if you have want to see some different colours, feel free to leave a request and I\'ll get on it :)
author: BurntBiscuits
